step_data.thought:
Looking at the page, I can see that I'm already on the product page for 'V8 +Energy, Healthy Energy Drink, Natural Energy from Tea, Pomegranate Blueberry, 8 Fl Oz Can (pack of 6)'. The URL indicates I'm at the reviews section (#reviews), but I need to actually see the reviews content.

I notice in the tablist there's a tab element [1606] labeled 'Reviews (12)' with a link [1607] to the reviews section. Since the URL already has #reviews in it but I'm not seeing the reviews content, I should click on this tab to make sure the reviews section is expanded and visible.

I'll click on the 'Reviews (12)' tab to view the product reviews.
